wikipedia_page.main: John Baring, 5th Baron Revelstoke (2 December 1934 – 5 June 2003) was a British landowner and aristocrat who spent much of his life in Kenya.

response: He succeeded his brother, John Baring, 5th Baron Revelstoke, born 2 December 1934, in 2003.
* John Baring, 5th Baron Revelstoke (1934–2003), who died without issue.
